Description:
Move in or Rent Out
In a quiet court location sonly metres from East Geelong Primary school, Gordon TAFE and St Albans Recreation Reserve sits this neat and modern townhouse. Consisting of 2 bedrooms open plan living, central bathroom and secure garage. There is a generous backyard and an undercover outdoor area to this low maintenance yet spacious townhouse.

Description:
A Myriad of Opportunities
This property boasts a huge allotment of 1238m2 approx in a position close to local shopping centres, public transport and local schools. With a myriad of options the opportunities are endless. Comprising a solid brick veneer home, neat and tidy but could also lend itself to some renovation work. 3 bedroom, spacious kitchen and open lounge-room/dining area. Neat bathroom and separate laundry. The light-filled living area is generous in size and offers gas heating for year round comfort. The property has large double gates which leads to a carport and also has plenty of room for the boat, trailer or caravan. Alongside is a large parcel of land providing future options (stca) for subdivision and unit development giving the buyer outstanding residual value and plenty of scope to unlock the true value of this property. Extremely rare and ready to go!
Terms: 10% Deposit, 30/60 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Description:
Great value, great home!
Savvy investors and first homebuyers can expect great value for money for this bright and inviting 3BR property. In a quiet area close to schools, Bellarine Highway conveniences and public transport, this generous, well-maintained residence offers significant rental return and will prove to be a great place to call home. On a spacious 609sqm block, the property is terrific for the keen investor or those entering the market with a young family in need of comfort and space in secure surrounds. The light-filled home with gas heating and rev/cyc air conditioning offers vibrant living space featuring a dining room overlooking the sheltered alfresco and a separate lounge off the kitchen. All three bedrooms feature BIR's including a master BR with full floor-to-ceiling mirrored robes. The property has ample parking including double garage all within an established setting. Previously leased at $290pw, take advantage of this sale and make this property yours today.
Insights: 8 Challenger Close, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Walk to shops from attractive unit
If you're looking for a homely unit to live in or invest, this 2-bedroom unit is sure to entice. Set in a quiet, secure block of units in Whittington, the lovely residence is just a short walk to the shopping precinct of Bellarine Highway. The home offers privacy, restful living areas and low maintenance surrounds ensuring an easy lifestyle.
The spacious living room features ceiling fans, gas heating and air conditioning, and a well-equipped kitchen caters adequately for those who enjoy cooking with ample bench space and cupboards. Built-in robes
are offered in the bedrooms and the laundry and bathroom are combined for ease of use. An outdoor area serves as a handy spot for quiet time or casual dining with visitors.
The comfortable, appealing unit is neat and tidy at every turn. Complete with single garage simply move in today and relish the good life.
Craig Casey : 0459 048 098

Description:
You Wont Be Short On Space
This is the perfect affordable opportunity for first home buyers, families or investors alike to purchase a great family home within an affordable price point. This home offers multiple zoned living areas providing a great sense of space.
Upon entry you will be greeted with a family lounge feat gas wall furnace with an outlook to the undercover area flowing through to the kitchen and family meals area. Kitchen features gas cooktop, oven and great cupboard space. A large rumpus room or living area can be found to the rear of the home comforted by a gas wall furnace featuring large picture windows. You can be assured, you won't be short on space.
4 Great sized bedrooms. Main BR with WIR , ceiling fan and 2 way bathroom whilst the remaining 3 BRS offer BIRS and ceiling fans serviced by a central family bathroom and separate toilet.
Outdoors you will find a large undercover area perfect for those who like to entertain whilst providing plenty of space for the kids to play.
Large gates allow access from the double carport for storage of either a boat, trailer or caravan and also access to the double garage.
We are offering this home for sale for the first time in 27 years, the current owners have loved living and raising their family here and now it's too big and time to move on.
Properties like this do not last long. Be quick to inspect.
Insights: 9 Cernan Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2015 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
4 Bedroom home without the price tag!
Spruce up or simply move in and relax, either way this home has so much to offer. Step inside and be surprised. Kitchen with long breakfast bar, 2 living areas and 4 bedrooms with built-in robes, it certainly is larger than it looks from the street. A gas stove plus gas heating are employed for ease and efficiency. An extra-large single garage means potential workshop space and the attached covered storage area could shelter your trailer. The fully fenced big backyard can safely contain pets and children at play. Central to so many facilities, there's little need for a car living here. Cycle into the CBD in 12 minutes or 6 driving, be bayside in 8 minutes by car or 15 by bike and the same to the closest train station for commuters. Stroll to choice of 2 primary schools, secondary college and the Gordon. Meander down to Bellarine Village shopping centre in under 10 minutes, and the Mill Market in less for a pleasant Sunday afternoon. Current rental return $300p.w. Both investors and home seekers should see this one!

Description:
The Perfect Investment or First Home!
What an opportunity we have on offer for you to snap up! Let's talk about location, this is arguably one of the best locations in Whittington with Newcomb and Saint Albans Park just a stone's throw away! Take advantage of Splashdown Leisure Centre and Creche on Coppards Road along with Grinter Reserve which is walking distance as well as all the amenities on the Bellarine Highway, medical clinics, library, kindergarten's, schools and public transport. A tidy home in a secure Court location surrounded by all amenities- majority within walking distance!
The floor plan of this home flows really well offering a spacious living area at the front of the home which can be zoned off from the kitchen and 2nd living area. Kitchen with gas stove top, dishwasher and ample cupboard space which look onto a large meals/ family room. The rear of the home oversees 2 bedrooms with BIR's, laundry, main bathroom with shower over bath, separate toilet and master with WIR and ensuite.
The backyard has plenty of room to run around and entertain, with and undercover paved area and lots of room down the back and sides of the house. Out the front also offers a high private fence and room to create a lovely front garden. Currently kept in a tidy manicured condition, there is more than enough room to make your ideas into a reality.
Features include, split system heating and cooling, single lock up garage, gas cooking, DW, BIR's, WIR, garden shed.
This sturdy 3 bedroom brick home is set upon 715m2 with the ability to achieve a rental mark of $330 p/w. This is one of those ripper buys that only come up every so often, great home, great location plenty of space and in a private Court - what are you waiting for?

Description:
A winner in Whittington
On a large block with everything at the fingertips, it's easy to see why this property makes a great home. The well-maintained brick home sits on a 668sqm block and offers a spacious living room with gas heating, well-equipped kitchen and meals area, and three big bedrooms with built-in robes. The bright interior is comfortable and cheerful with plenty of natural light, air conditioning and gas heating. The keen gardener or outdoor lover will appreciate the huge leafy backyard featuring a paving, lovely private surrounds and the opportunity to easily add a veggie patch or enjoy other hobbies outside. A double garage ensures adequate car parking and storage space. This property is ideally located only a 5min drive to the CBD and Bellarine and Newcomb shopping centres. Gordon Tafe east campus, Boundary Road shopping strip, schools, sporting facilities and Bellarine Rail Trail are within easy reach. Make the most of this neat and tidy home today.

Description:
Fully Renovated Beauty 5 Minutes from CBD
Fully renovated from front door to back door, you will be pleasantly surprised by this charming 3 bedroom home which has a great blend of modern and period style features. Tasmanian Oak polished floorboards flow throughout the home along with 9 foot ceilings. Master bedroom includes a WIR and woollen carpets, the other 2 bedrooms include BIRs. The updated and renovated kitchen includes self-closing pot drawers, dishwasher, gas cook top, electric oven, wood grain bench tops and stainless steel appliances along with a breakfast bar that overlooks the dining area. The main bathroom has been beautifully updated with stylish fixtures and fittings including separate bath and shower, double vanity and a European laundry. In the main living area sits a Coonara fireplace which is perfect for the cooler months and for when the weather warms up a split system will keep you cool. As you make your way out to the spacious backyard you will find a lovely decked area and plenty of grass for the kids. The home also includes double lock up garage and separate workshop with toilet. This property sits on 780m2 allotment and also has approved council planning & building permits. A must to inspect!

Description:
Don't Let This One Get Away
A rare opportunity to purchase a modern 4 bedroom, 2 story home situated so close to Geelong's CBD, schools, shopping centres, horse racing and sporting facilities. The upper level consists of a huge master bedroom with full ensuite and his & hers WIR, a generous sized bathroom with separate WC and 2 queen sized bedrooms with WIR's. Downstairs there is a well appointed kitchen with WIP and S/S appliances, 2 living zones, a 4th Bedroom/study, laundry and separate powder room. The house is kept comfortable all year round with Central Heating and Evaporative Cooling. Outside you will find a double garage adjoined to the home with rear access and driveway leading to a 7x6m approx. work shop at the rear of the property. Other features include an outside entertainment area, verandah, secure front fence, roller shutters on rear bedrooms, water tank and 16 solar panels.

Description:
Reward yourselves with this excellent entertainer!
This attractive modern brick home is a family entertainer at heart, offering inviting indoor and outdoor spaces graced with many lifestyle enhancing features.
Alfresco living is proportioned for grand scale entertaining, set in a weather proof area that accesses a heated spa pool, 42" wall mounted plasma at one end and a north facing deck with pizza oven, and lush lawn at the other. Set on easy care tiles with ample room for soft furnishings, a dining table and BBQ, this bright outdoor space is the jewel in any entertainer's crown.
Indoors, open plan living enables family togetherness with a roomy lounge/dining space. The kitchen boasts stainless steel mod cons (dishwasher, 900 mm electric oven with matching gas cooktop and range hood) and a spacious step-in pantry. Indoor living merges seamlessly with outdoor entertaining.
Bedrooms are well proportioned. The master sits in privacy at the faade and offers full-height built-in robes and a fresh en suite shower room. Two further bedrooms offer built-in robes and close proximity to the family bathroom with bath, shower and separate toilet. The laundry accesses a convenient undercover utility space in the backyard.
The home is extremely comfortable with split system ACs to the living hub and master bedroom, ducted gas heating and ceiling fans throughout. DLUG with internal access, 1400L tank, large garden shed and spacious secure front yard.
The quiet court setting and close proximity to Newcomb Central and Bellarine Village provide an ideal base for a family. Five minutes to the CBD and 15 minutes to renowned Bellarine beaches.
Reward yourselves with this private, leisure-based family home! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Large Corner Block - Top Spot
A super-sized block and a very convenient location are major highlights of this exceptionally maintained home. Positioned on a securely fenced 801sqm corner block, the 3BR residence provides plenty of scope for the buyer with the opportunity to subdivide (STCA) or renovate further. Everything you need is at your doorstep, such as Gordon Tafe, primary school and football oval, or simply a short walk or drive away to food outlets, shopping centres and public transport. The comfortable home is nestled in a leafy setting, with garage and garden shed. The spacious lounge room has gas heating and is separate to the well-equipped kitchen featuring extensive bench and cupboard space and adjoining meals area. Split system air conditioning has been installed in the very neatly presented home while a refreshing bathroom and three big bedrooms including built-in robes complete this bright and appealing property.
In a top location, don't miss this opportunity today!
Craig Casey : 0459 048 098

Description:
Renovate and Reinvigorate
Great opportunity for the first home buyer, investor or those looking for a humble solid brick veneer home or investment property they can renovate and style their own way. Positioned in Whittington just a short distance to conveniences, public transport, the Bellarine Hwy and only minutes from the CBD, this 3BR residence needs a little attention to give it the modern makeover that it deserves. The creative buyer has the opportunity to enhance the living areas and functionality of the kitchen which are already brimming with character thanks to a boldly painted interior and floorboards throughout. The home has three bedrooms main with built-in robes, gas heating and is presented on a generous 558sqm (approx.) block with garage & ample parking. Supermarkets, parks, schools, public transport and the popular Bellarine Rail Trail are within easy reach. Inspect today.
Craig Casey : 0459 048 098
